225200.name: Farming Simulator 2013 Modding Tutorials
225200.description:
This series of video tutorials will help you to learn more about the modding tools offered in Farming Simulator 2013®.


Through 18 video tutorials, you will learn how to:


  • Use Giants editor
  • Edit vehicles and map for the game
  • Import/export mods in your favorite 3D software (Maya / 3Ds MAX / Blender)
  • Edit game textures with Photoshop
  • Optimize your mods
This DLC also includes the "Vehicle Motor Calculator" to easily set up the motor performances of your mods.
225200.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
